    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractBrick
    Abstract base class for all Tetris brick implementations.
    AnimationHandler
    Handles the game animation loop and coordinates game state transitions.
    AudioManager
    Singleton class managing all audio playback for the Tetris game.
    BackgroundAnimator
     
    Board
    Represents the game board and defines the core game mechanics for Tetris.
    BoardRenderer
    Renders the Tetris game board and brick displays using JavaFX.
    Brick
    Represents a Tetris brick (tetromino) piece.
    BrickBagPolicy
    Defines the policy for creating bags of bricks.
    BrickGenerator
    Interface for generating Tetris bricks.
    BrickPlacedEvent
    Event record representing that a brick has been placed on the board.
    BrickRotator
    Handles brick rotation and tracks the current rotation state.
    BrickType
    Enumeration of all standard Tetris brick types.
    ClassicLevel
    The classic Tetris level with constant drop speed.
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of a row clearing operation in Tetris.
    CommandRegistry
    Interface for registering game commands with the input system.
    ConfirmationDialogController
    Controller for confirmation dialogs.
    ConfirmationEventHandler
    Event handler interface for confirmation dialog actions.
    DefaultCommandRegistry
    Default implementation of CommandRegistry that registers standard Tetris controls.
    DefaultGuiControllerDependenciesFactory
    Factory class for creating GuiController dependencies.
    DefaultInputCommandFactory
    Default implementation of InputCommandFactory.
    DefaultScorePolicy
    Default implementation of ScorePolicy.
    DistortionAnimator
    Creates a "bad signal" distortion effect using a DisplacementMap.
    DynamicLevel
    Abstract base class for levels with dynamic speed that increases with score.
    EventSource
    Enumeration of event sources indicating who triggered the event.
    EventType
    Enumeration of movement event types in the game.
    FireworkAnimator
    More dramatic firework animator: larger particle counts, further spread, longer durations, expanding ring, and a small secondary sparkle burst.
    GameActionInvoker
    Interface for invoking game actions from commands.
    GameCommand
    Represents a game command that can be executed.
    GameComponentBuilder
    Builder class for constructing game components.
    GameComponentBuilder.GameComponents
    Container record for the game's core components.
    GameController
     
    GameEventBusProvider
    Singleton provider for the game event bus.
    GameEventListener
    Interface for receiving game events from the event publisher.
    GameEventPublisher
    Interface for publishing game events to registered listeners.
    GameFlowManager
    Manages the flow of game events when bricks move down.
    GameLevel
    Defines the characteristics of a game level in Tetris.
    GameLoop
    Manages the main game loop using JavaFX Timeline animation.
    GameOverController
    Controller for the game over screen.
    GameOverManager
    Manages all game over logic including overlay visibility, opacity transitions, curtain animations, and post-game-over confirmation dialogs.
    GameStateManager
    Manages the current state of the game using the State design pattern.
    GameStateManager.GameOverState
     
    GameStateManager.GameState
     
    GameStateManager.PausedState
     
    GameStateManager.RunningState
     
    GameStateSnapshot
    Snapshot of the complete game state at a point in time.
    GameTimer
    GameTimer manages the elapsed time display for the game.
    GameViewController
    Controller for the main game view screen.
    GameViewPresenter
     
    GarbageMechanic
    Manages the timing and generation of garbage rows in Tetris.
    GuiController
     
    GuiControllerDependencies
    Record containing all dependencies required by the GuiController.
    IBrick
     
    IGameController
    Interface for the main game controller.
    IGuiController
    Interface for GUI controllers that manage the game view.
    InputCommandFactory
    Factory interface for creating game command instances.
    InputCommandRegistrar
    Interface for registering game commands with key bindings.
    InputController
    InputController is a dedicated wrapper that centralizes all input handling logic, including keyboard input, mouse hover, and click events.
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling game input events.
    InputHandler
    Handles keyboard input and maps key presses to game commands.
    InputHandlerHarness
    Simple harness to verify InputHandler horizontal inversion behaviour.
    InputHandlerHarness.RecordingController
     
    InstantDropCommand
    Command to instantly drop the current brick to the bottom (hard drop).
    JBrick
     
    LBrick
     
    Level1
    Level 1 with progressive speed increase based on score.
    Level2
    Level 2 with limited rotation mechanic.
    Level3
    Level 3 - The most challenging level with multiple difficulty modifiers.
    LevelSelectionController
    Controller for the level selection screen.
    LevelSelectionEventHandler
    Event handler interface for level selection screen actions.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Tetris JavaFX application.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu screen.
    MatrixOperations
     
    MenuController
    Handles all menu, pause, and tutorial UI interactions separate from the in-game rendering logic.
    MenuEventHandler
    Event handler interface for menu actions.
    MoveDownCommand
    Command to move the current brick one cell down (soft drop).
    MoveEvent
     
    MoveLeftCommand
    Command to move the current brick one cell to the left.
    MoveRightCommand
    Command to move the current brick one cell to the right.
    NebulaCloudAnimator
    NebulaCloudAnimator creates and animates colorful nebula gas clouds.
    NextShapeInfo
     
    NotificationAnimator
     
    NotificationPanel
     
    OBrick
     
    OverlayPanel
     
    PauseMenuController
    Controller for the pause menu screen.
    PixelStarAnimator
    PixelStarAnimator creates and animates small twinkling pixel stars across the screen.
    PixelStarExplosion
    Creates and animates a pixel star explosion effect.
    Pure
     
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Generates bricks using a bag randomization system.
    RotateCommand
    Command to rotate the current brick counterclockwise.
    RotationStrategy
    Strategy interface for finding valid rotation positions.
    RowClearAnimator
    Handles row clearing animations for the Tetris game.
    SafeMediaPlayer
    A lightweight wrapper around JavaFX MediaPlayer accessed via reflection.
    SBrick
     
    Score
    Represents the player's score in the game.
    ScoreCalculator
    Utility class for score calculations.
    ScoreChangeEvent
    Event record representing a change in the player's score.
    ScoreManager
    Manages score calculations and publishes score change events.
    ScorePolicy
    Interface for calculating score values based on game events.
    ScoreThresholdDetector
    Utility class for detecting when score crosses certain thresholds.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the settings/music control screen.
    SettingsEventHandler
    Event handler interface for settings/music control screen actions.
    ShootingStarAnimator
    ShootingStarAnimator creates and animates shooting star effects across the game screen.
    ShuffleBagPolicy
    Implementation of BrickBagPolicy using random shuffling.
    SimpleBoard
     
    SimpleGameEventBus
    Simple implementation of GameEventPublisher using the Observer pattern.
    SoundManager
    Manages all sound-related operations including: - Start sound playback - Local sound effect player references - Volume slider initialization and binding - Music fade-to-main transition scheduling This class extracts sound setup logic from GuiController without changing any behavior.
    StandardRotationStrategy
    Standard implementation of RotationStrategy with wall-kick support.
    StarBackgroundManager
    Example class demonstrating how to integrate ShootingStarAnimator into the Tetris game's background.
    StaticScreenAnimator
     
    TBrick
     
    TutorialController
    Controller for the tutorial screen.
    TutorialEventHandler
    Event handler interface for tutorial screen actions.
    UIConstants
    Constants for UI layout and timing.
    ViewData
    Data transfer object containing all view-related information for rendering.
    VisualEffectsManager
    VisualEffectsManager manages all visual effects in the game including: - Nebula clouds (background cosmic effects) - Pixel stars (twinkling starfield) - Shooting stars (animated streaks across screen) - Flicker effects (screen flickering for Level 3) - Intro sequence animations This class centralizes visual effect logic that was previously scattered across GuiController, making the controller more focused on coordination.
    ZBrick
